channel.title: procedure, measurement, density on
channel.description: Recent content in procedure, measurement, density on

item.description: Measuring Density Of Irregular Objects Instruments Measuring cylinder Water Electronic balance Procedure Keep the measuring cylinder with water on the electronic balance Mark its mass (M1) and volume (V1) Put the object inside the measuring cylinder and measure its final mass (M2) and final volume (V2) Density can be found using the formulae below $$D = \frac{M_2 - M_1}{V_2 - V_1}$$
